about_the_game:
A soundtrack crafted especially for horror fans.

Being a solo developer is no easy task, so I released the "Left to Rot — Original Digital Soundtrack".
I'm not a professional musician, but I've poured my heart and soul into creating these tracks.

This downloadable content (DLC) includes the complete original soundtrack for the psychological horror game "Left to Rot." It offers various ambient instrumental pieces, from soft, lyrical melodies to eerie and unsettling tones. The soundtrack seamlessly blends piano, violin, guitar, and electronic drones to create an immersive audio experience that draws the listener into a deeply haunting atmosphere.

The soundtrack is composed by Tarba Paul Cornel.
